introduction: SYNOPSISHyun-woo has a destined meeting with Da-young, his former English language and literature teacher in college. Da-young is now a widow. Hyun-woo feels strangely drawn to her. The nature of their business has them working together so Hyun-woo and Da-young naturally become close. Manager Nam Do-yeon has feelings for Da-young so he sends Hyun-woo away to the Pusan branch. Da-young's daughter, Hye-rim, is disappointed in her mother so she leaves for America with her fiancee. Da-young is about to go see Manager Nam on a promised date when upon her friend, Mrs. Woo's advice, she goes to Pusan to see Hyun-woo instead. Hyun-woo and Da-young spend a dreamlike time together. Afterwards, Da-young feels like there is a wall between them so she tries to break it off with Hyun-woo. However, Hyun-woo will hear none of it. Finally, Da-young burns everything last remnant of Hyun-woo and leaves him at dawn.故事Hyun-woo在学生生涯中是英语教授，现在通过与遗with Da Young的命运相遇，感受到一种微妙的感情。继续离不开业务的Hyeonwoo和Daeyoung自然会相互接触。大爷导演Namyoung承认Hyun-woo到釜山，Daimyung的女儿Hyerim离开了她的未婚妻和美国。达Young with of。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。最后，大妍burn oung with with with with with with。。。。。。。。。。。。。
